text: Ara smarana karo! Marimayaputra isa balechilena -- ''he isara'ilera bansadharagana! Ami niscaya'i tomadera nikata allah‌ra rasula, amara samakse ta'orate ya rayeche ami tara samarthanakari, ara susambadadata emana eka rasula sanbandhe yini amara pare asabena, tamra nama'ah‌mada’.’’ Tarapara yakhana tini tadera kache elena spasta pramanabalisaha, tara balale -- ''e to eka spasta jadu!’’
